# hijread

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of hijread is to facilitate the conversion from dates in the standard Gregorian calendar to Islamic dates following the Hijri calendar.

## Installation

You can install the development version of hijread from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Luka-Vasilj/hijread")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r}
library(hijread)
## basic example code
```
